content.description: A blind alien placement (yellow or green size) in the horizontal at the start
content.protection: Trad gear- pitons, chain on tree
content.location: Start 10ft Â left of Green Cards at a blank section of wall with a horizonatal crack 10ft up. The line goes pretty much straight up the wall past 2 pitons . Then climb the crack throughthe headwall and move right to a tree anchor.

content.description: Start on a vertical crack to the left of a horizontal crack, make balancy and slightly committing moves to the horizontal crack and place a cam, then move up clipping two pitons. Continue to a small roof, move up along a thin crack on the right end of the roof and then traverse to another vertical crack on somewhat thin crimps. Continue up on good edges, clip 1 piton, save some juice for a slight runout to the finishing jugs.
content.location: The start of the route is to the right of a lichenous scoop.
